com.bnotions.vicinity.device
Interface Device

All Known Implementing Classes:
DeviceAbsImpl, RemoteDevice, ServerDevice
public interface Device

This interface defines the common functionality of both Remote Devices and Server Devices.

Since:
2012-06-13
Author:
Matthew Patience

Method Summary
 void connect()
          This method will either make a connection to a socket or listen on a socket, depending on the device type.
 void disconnect()
          This should be called when you are finished with a connection.
 void sendMessage(java.lang.String data)
          Sends a message to the connected device.
 void setDeviceListener(DeviceListener listener)
          Sets a listener to listen for state changes and received messages.
 

Method Detail

connect

void connect()
             throws java.net.UnknownHostException,
                    java.io.IOException
This method will either make a connection to a socket or listen on a socket, depending on the device type. The method will throw an IllegalStateException if the device IP address is not set before calling this method.

Throws:
java.net.UnknownHostException
java.io.IOException

disconnect

void disconnect()
This should be called when you are finished with a connection. Be sure to call this in an Activity's onDestroy().

setDeviceListener

void setDeviceListener(DeviceListener listener)
Sets a listener to listen for state changes and received messages.

Parameters:
listener -

sendMessage

void sendMessage(java.lang.String data)
Sends a message to the connected device. This method will throw an IllegalArgumentException if the device is not connected. This method is asynchronous.

Parameters:
data - The data to be sent
